extension_notes.label: Discontinued Products Common Issues
extension_notes.comment:
The "Discontinued Product" and "Discontinued Category" attributes are missing

If the installer has not run successfully, you can have Magento reinstall the extension. In your database, in the "core_resource" table, find the entry with code "discontinuedproducts_setup". Delete this entry, clear your cache, and refresh the admin panel. The attributes should then be created as normal.

The alternative products are not showing up

While a product is available to buy, no alternatives are displayed. You can set a product to discontinued and specify the category to load alternatives from, but nothing will appear on the front end until the product can no longer be purchased.

Different products are being displayed, compared to what I was expecting

The extension skips products as alternatives if they are not available to buy, to ensure customers are not bounced from one discontinued product to another and back again.

This extension is really useful. Where can I find more like it?

You can find all Added Bytes extensions for Magento in our in our Magento Extension store.
